context.background: The challenges facing our society are ever more complex, interdependent and multilateral.
context.vision: The Cherrytwist Foundation is a non-profit, open source platform and community focussed on providing a digital public infrastructure to enable society to come together and proactively co-create outcomes.
context.impact: A step change in how complex challenges are managed and our ability as society to collaborate in creating solutions to our problems

references.name: website
references.description: The open source challenge management platform
